sentences.en: A bird had been locked in and was by now quite frantic.
sentences.cn: 一只鸟被关进了笼子，到现在它都十分狂躁。

sentences.en: A busy night in the restaurant can be frantic in the kitchen.
sentences.cn: 餐馆晚上生意好，厨房里可能会忙成一片。

sentences.en: A holiday isn't an optional extra. In this stressful, frantic world it's a must.
sentences.cn: 休假并非可有可无。在这个紧张而忙碌的世界，它是必不可少的。

sentences.en: Cold sweat bedewed Mr. Lin's forehead . He was frantic.
sentences.cn: 可是林先生却急坏了,冷汗从额角上钻出来.
一片疯狂的欢呼随之而起.

sentences.en: Gral Lagher was ill at ease and then abruptly frantic.
sentences.cn: 加拉赫愈听愈不安,后来突然就象疯了一样.

sentences.en: He beat a frantic tattoo with his hands on the door.
sentences.cn: 他用手疯狂地连续敲门.

sentences.en: He made frantic dash for the departing train.
sentences.cn: 他发疯似地冲向正开出的火车.

sentences.en: I spent three frantic days trying to get everything ready.
sentences.cn: 我花了三天时间手忙脚乱地做准备。

sentences.en: I've had a frantic rush to get my work done.
sentences.cn: 我急急忙忙地赶完工作.

sentences.en: She watched the frantic flow of cars and buses along the street.
sentences.cn: 她注视着街上小汽车和巴士汇成的滚滚车流。

sentences.en: The children are driving me frantic.
sentences.cn: 孩子们快要让我发疯了。

sentences.en: The mother was frantic with grief at the loss of her child.
sentences.cn: 母亲因失去孩子悲痛欲绝.

sentences.en: They clapped their hands and went frantic with admiration.
sentences.cn: 他们噼噼啪啪地鼓掌,如痴如狂地赞美.

sentences.en: When she discovered her baby had disappeared, she was greatly frantic.
sentences.cn: 她发现孩子不见了, 大惊失色.

sentences.en: With a frantic gesture he rushed out of the room.
sentences.cn: 他作了个发狂般的姿势,便冲出屋去了.

trans.tran_cn: 发疯似的，发狂的，厉害的，非常的
trans.tran_en: extremely worried and frightened about a situation, so that you cannot control your feelings
